title: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "The Language and Thought of the Child" by Jean Piaget, Meridian Books", 1955
medium: Lithography in purple, gold, white and blue ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover vertically in blue ink at lower left in script: lustig
On the top 1/3 of the page in gold, white and blue ink: the language [gold]/ and thought [white]/ of the child [blue]/ JEAN PIAGET [white]
Across the bottom in white and blue ink: MERIDIAN BOOKS [white] published by The Noonday Press/ M10 $1.35 [blue]
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The bookjacket has a purple background. The author, title and publisher are written vertically down the spine. On the back cover are the title, author's name and a synopsis of the book. Produced for Meridian Press.
